title: ps34
author: ps34
content: hello don't know if this is right place but i have a restricted account / locked   and someone needs  to connect to it  from poland    can someone help me   someone trusted   can pay a fee also

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: Care to elaborate?Account from which website are we talking about here? By "connect to it from poland", do you mean access it from a Poland IP? or verify the account for you?

comments.author: ps34
comments.body: well yeah it's a personal account i use  and  someone from poland with indeed an polish ip  should connect to this account   from his pc

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: ps34 on October 01, 2022, 11:52:20 AMwell yeah it's a personal account i use  and  someone from poland with indeed an polish ip  should connect to this account   from his pc  Yet again you failed to mention about which website are you talking about here. If all you need is Polish IP, why don't you simply use VPN instead? That looks to me like a much easier solution than finding someone from Poland to do that for you (unless you need Polish ID as well, which is entirely different thing and should be mentioned).

comments.author: ps34
comments.body: because they need an exact location   because vpn was detected  so it must be from a polish ip  and not my  vpn ip  someone from  poland contact  me don't know why i would need to mention site here if you contact me  i will tell you what site it is

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: ps34 on October 01, 2022, 03:14:56 PMbecause they need an exact location   because vpn was detected  so it must be from a polish ip  and not my  vpn ip  someone from  poland contact  me don't know why i would need to mention site here if you contact me  i will tell you what site it is As far as I know, using Dedicated IP address will solve this problem, since it is not redistributed as easily as public VPN's addresses.You just need to search for a service that provides Dedicated IP address for Poland and one that accepts payments with Bitcoin or gift cards.If you can't find that service then it makes sense to ask someone to do it for you.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Still, you haven't explained well what you need exactly and which site should connect to. What's the problem if you dare the site publicly? There would phishing sites can damage anything that will connect. Who will take the risk? Rather than buy a dedicated IP address or find some alternative if you can't share site publicly. How can a site hurt you unless you share credentials? It doesn't make sense and seems quite suspicious to me.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: ps34 on October 01, 2022, 03:14:56 PMdon't know why i would need to mention site here if you contact me  i will tell you what site it is You don't have to, but your request would look less suspicious if you are more transparent about what you actually need, especially considering your trust feedback. At the moment it simply looks dodgy to me, and judging by other comments I am not the only one who has that opinion.Btw, you might have more luck asking in Polish local board.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: ps34 on October 01, 2022, 03:14:56 PMdon't know why i would need to mention site here if you contact me  i will tell you what site it is It's better for one to know so that they decide if they can help or not. Why would I waste time sending a PM if I don't even know which kind of website I am going to work with?Worse still, your trust feedback makes it even harder for people to trust you, let alone deal with you via PM

comments.author: ps34
comments.body: well it's a locked gambling account so i would need fixed polish ip  so they know exact location if someone also has dedicated ip for poland i could use i'm willing to pay monthly for it   would appreciate it  one or both ways you can contact me through pm

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: I think no one will provide you with such a thing here on the forum if your trust is -5. Maybe they will show up if you can escrow your payment to them.  Or why not buy an AWS account run 1 RPC instance and choose a region that Poland is included? I guess it's a paid one you don't need to find someone to do it for you. Or use VPN that supports dedicated IP and can able to choose where you live on the map or GPS spoofing you can check IPvanish it's cheap and you can use it for other activities. You don't need to look for someone living in Poland you can use IPvanish that you look living in Poland.

comments.author: ps34
comments.body: well i used polish  ip  from expressvpn and they found out eitherway     (i rent a pc in datacenter  in poland)   and connect with my pc to this  data center pc through rdc   so i only need one guy to connect from his pc to my gambling account don't think that's too much to ask here i pay   btc   but for this to happen someone needs to contact me offcourse

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: ps34 on October 02, 2022, 12:30:00 AMwell i used polish  ip  from expressvpn and they found out eitherway     (i rent a pc in datacenter  in poland)   and connect with my pc to this  data center pc through rdc   No surprise that ExpressVPN IP has been flagged by that gambling site since its a very popular VPN, used by many people. Iirc (haven't used ExpressVPN for some time) they don't even have a large amount of Polish servers so that's another reason why its so easy to for a gambling site to track those.Quote from: ps34 on October 02, 2022, 12:30:00 AMbut for this to happen someone needs to contact me offcourse The biggest obstacle for that to happen is your trust score and reputation (or lack of) so I am not too optimistic about that.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: Quote from: ps34 on October 02, 2022, 12:30:00 AMwell i used polish  ip  from expressvpn and they found out eitherway     (i rent a pc in datacenter  in poland)   and connect with my pc to this  data center pc through rdc   so i only need one guy to connect from his pc to my gambling account don't think that's too much to ask here i pay   btc   but for this to happen someone needs to contact me offcourse Do you think adding more IP addresses to your account will solve the problem? Most of these sites follow IDS/IPS detection activity, and if they found an unusual change in the login pattern, the red indicators will increase, and therefore they will ask you for more data such as a phone number, bank account, passport, or invoice.

comments.author: ps34
comments.body: well i verified my account with a bill statement and id  front and back that's no problem however they want me to connect without vpn  and i don't live in poland so i can't do this but someone from poland can do this and if they see this maybe they unrestrict my account again don't have anything to lose i guess so why not guys what vpn   should i try then   wich have a dedicated  polish ip address ?

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: ps34 on October 02, 2022, 12:18:35 PMhowever they want me to connect without vpn  and i don't live in poland so i can't do this but someone from poland can do this and if they see this maybe they unrestrict my account again It may not seem as easy as you think. That website definitely has a record of the data they get from you, apart from just IP addresses. This could include the device ID, timezone, browser version and type or user agent, operating system etc. Just check the privacy policy of the site to confirm this.If you assign someone with a completely different computer from yours to sign in. That will still be a red flag to them, and they probably won't unblock your account.

comments.author: ps34
comments.body: yeah don't care i want that account unrestricted period   the person can have btc  for doing this

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: What did the support say to you? is there no chance of leniency for your situation? especially if the restriction is mostly just because of VPN... or is there something more?This is also another reason to spill which website are we talking about here. Sometimes it could really make difference when things are publicized, who knows perhaps they're active here as well?

comments.author: ps34
comments.body: vpn is not endorsed but not forbidden it says in their TOS  so  i don't know they demand i need to login to my account with a polish ip without interference of a vpn  so can't change that so they will unrestrict my account again i hope when someone logs in with a polish ip so that's why i need a person from poland to login    it's a simple login   so don't understand what's the fuss is about exactly  (and you get paid even for doing so)

comments.author: Techdev
comments.body: Hit me up on Telegram. I will help. @ElevatedWarrior
